items.title: Why Napkin Thoughts
items.content_text: Want to discuss high-value ideas, but don’t want to spend time to polish them.  By getting faster feedback on core ideas, I can improve them faster / choose which to make better.  Seems useful to spend more time building models vs. passively consuming content.
items.content_html:
• Want to discuss high-value ideas, but don’t want to spend time to polish them.
  • By getting faster feedback on core ideas, I can improve them faster / choose which to make better.
  • Seems useful to spend more time building models vs. passively consuming content.
